short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Share current tab, links and selected text on Twitter (X.com).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use the toolbar button, keyboard shortcut (alt + t) or the context menu (right click menu) options to share the current tab, links and selected text on X (formerly known as Twitter).

Extension by BrowserNative. Not affiliated with or created by X.com/Twitter.
